name: SHIFT HEROES (Remicy)
description:
How to Play 
----------- 
1. Collect resources with different tools/classes; 
2. Use your resources to upgrade to bigger inventory. 
3. Collect more resources! 


Controls 
----------- 
You may need to click on the game screen before the keys can work 

[Q],[W]: Shapeshift 
[Tab]: Open menu. (To upgrade inventory for more space.) 
[Left-Click](hold): Boost 
[1],[2],[3]: Switch Classes (only available in the post-compo version.) 


Classes 
----------- 
Gatherer: 
- Q: Pickaxe, mine stones & minerals 
- W: Axe, chop woods 

Knight: 
- Q: Sword, kill enemies (not including bosses!) and loot coins 
- W: Shield, can run through bosses when in Boost 


Mage: 
- Q: Crystal ball, absorb element resources 
- W: Wings, move really fast 


Boost Effects ( hold [Left-Click] ) 
----------- 
Shield of Kight: Invincible 
Wings of Mage: Insanely fast 
Others: Simply move faster 



Dev Tools 
----------- 
Flash, AS3, Photoshop, BeepBox, jfxr 
BGM is made based on the babblings of my 9-month-old son.
